ddf.compression.exi

Class EXIEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.compression.exi.EXIEncoder

  • public final class EXIEncoder
extends Object
    Performs encoding and decoding xml compression using EXI.

    More information is available at http://www.w3.org/XML/EXI/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void decode(InputStream exiStream, OutputStream xmlStream)
      Takes the incoming exiStream and performs EXI-decoding on it into the xmlStream.
      static void encode(InputStream xmlStream, OutputStream exiStream)
      Takes the incoming xmlStream and performs EXI-encoding on it into the exiStream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • encode

                          OutputStream exiStream)
                   throws org.openexi.proc.common.EXIOptionsException,
                          org.openexi.sax.TransmogrifierException,
                          IOException
        Takes the incoming xmlStream and performs EXI-encoding on it into the exiStream.

        xmlStream - Input of xml data
        exiStream - Output of exi-encoded data

                          OutputStream xmlStream)
        Takes the incoming exiStream and performs EXI-decoding on it into the xmlStream.
        Parameters:
        exiStream - Input of exi-encoded data
        xmlStream - Output of xml data
